        void addPerson(Person person)
        throws PersonAlreadyExistsException
        adds a person to the database
        Parameters:
        person - the person to add to the database
        Throws:
        PersonAlreadyExistsException - when the passed person already exists within the database

      • personExists

        boolean personExists(Person person)
        checks to see if a person already exists within the database
        Parameters:
        person - person to check against the database
        Returns:
        true or false whether or not the person already exists within the database

      • getPerson

        Person getPerson(java.lang.String personID)
          throws PersonNotFoundException
        Parameters:
        personID - matches this username to the person
        Returns:
        the person with the given personID
        Throws:
        PersonNotFoundException - when the passed personID does not have an associated person in the database

      • getPerson

        Person getPerson(Event event)
          throws EventNotFoundException
        Parameters:
        event - event to match to a person
        Returns:
        the person whose event was passed, otherwise returns null if the event does not occur in the database
        Throws:
        EventNotFoundException - when the passed event does not exist in the database
